embed.text1: Would you want this power but

embed.title: Info
embed.description: **Would You** is a discord bot built to increase discord server activity.

Fields.name: **My Commands**
Fields.value:
`/Would You` - Start a discussion about random powers
`/ping` - Pong!
`/language` - Change the language of the bot for the server
`/help` - Shows this info
`/rather` - Gives you two powers to choose from
`/custom` - Sends a custom would you message in the chat!
`/wwyd` - Sends a what would you do question in the chat
`/welcome` - Add or remove the welcome channel!
`/support` - If you ever need help on the bot, use this command to get help from the support team!
Fields.privacy: We value your privacy. If you have any concerns about your data, check out privacy policy [here](https://wouldyoubot.gg/privacy).

embed.title: Voting helps **Would You** gain more users! Make sure to vote every day!

embed.thispower: According to the vote the majority of users would prefer:

replays.disabled: Replaying in this server is currently disabled!

button.nocustom: There's currently no custom Would You messages to be displayed! Either make some or change the type using /Would You type

embed.title: Would You Replays
embed.errorDesc: In order to use this command you need to vote for the bot!
embed.missingPerms: You are missing the `Manage Server` permission to use this command.

embed.title: Would You | Guide
embed.description: Guide to use the full potential of Would You
embed.name1: How to correctly use Would You!
embed.value1:
Create a dedicated channel for the bot or allow users to use the bot in the main chat. 
 > Would You's purpose is to make chats more active so it would be very ironic to deny the usage of would you in main chats. 
 > If you want to use the bot to its fullest potential, use the </welcome:1011374285350260914> command and setup a welcome channel. The channel will be used to send a would you message once a user joins.
embed.value2: > The intention behind this is to help new users be part of the conversation by giving the members a topic to talk about right after joining! This not only makes the server more active, but it also makes new users feel more included right after joining the server and encourages them to stay for longer!
embed.value3: > Yes! Make sure to talk about the topic you got instead of spamming the commands. This will help the members build a conversation and make the server more active in minutes! There is an image attached with a prime example on how to use the bot!

webhookManager.noWebhook: Due to a necessary change for performance, I need **Manage Webhooks** permissions to send this message! (If I have these permissions but this message still appears, make sure it\'s possible for me to create a Webhook!

Settings.errorSame: The provided timezone is the same timezone that is already set. Make sure to choose a different timezone.
Settings.errorInvalid: Provided timezone was invalid, you can pick a valid timezone from this [Time Zone Picker](https://kevinnovak.github.io/Time-Zone-Picker/)
Settings.intervalSame: The provided post time is the same post time that is already set. Make sure to choose a different post time.
Settings.intervalInvalid: Provided post time was invalid. Make sure your post time is in the 24h format and mintues are either 00 or 30!
Settings.dailyChannel: Select a channel where you want Daily Messages to be!
Settings.replayChannel: Select a channel that you want to add a replay cooldown to!
Settings.replayChannelNone: You don't have any replay channels set!
Settings.replayCooldownMin: Provided cooldown is too short, make sure cooldowns are above 2 seconds! (2000 milliseconds)
Settings.replayChannelAlready: The provided channel already has a cooldown!
Settings.replayDelete: Select a channel that you want to remove a replay cooldown from!
Settings.cooldownTooLong: Provided cooldown was too long. Make sure the cooldown is less than 6 hours (21600000 milliseconds)!
Settings.replayChannelLimit: You can only add 15 channels to the replay cooldown!
Settings.dailyType: Select a type of Daily Message you want to be sent!
Settings.welcomeType: Select a type of Welcome Message you want to be sent!
Settings.dailyRole: Select a role that you want to be pinged in Daily Messages!
Settings.replaySame: The provided replay cooldown is the same cooldown that is already set. Make sure to choose a different cooldown.
Settings.voteSame: The provided vote cooldown is the same cooldown that is already set. Make sure to choose a different cooldown.
Settings.cooldownInvalid: Provided cooldown was invalid. Make sure the cooldown only includes numbers!
